channel.title: Error with changing the the spawn point of characters?
channel.description: Well not really an error but, I changed the initial x and y coordinates of the player In Player.Java and whenever I create a new user, He spawns where the coords I put in, but whenever I press "home" On the spellbook it goes back to edgeville. help?

item.title: Error with changing the the spawn point of characters?
item.dc:creator: @thisserverrocks thisserverrocks
item.description:
@thisserverrocks wrote:

Well not really an error but, I changed the initial x and y coordinates of the player In Player.Java and whenever I create a new user, He spawns where the coords I put in, but whenever I press “home” On the spellbook it goes back to edgeville. help?
